question: Recently India suffered unfavourable balance of trade due to which of the following reasons?
option2: Import of oil and food grains
explanation: The increasing trade deficit in spite of positive growth of exports is mainly due to higher imports of products such as crude oil, electronic goods, iron and steel, chemicals, coke, fertilizers, and machinery, he said. These products contribute over 70 per cent share in total imports in 2018-19.
